steps.title: Advanced Techniques: Adding Watermarks to {{FileformatCap}} Documents via {{EnvName}}

content.title: Exploring Advanced Watermarking Techniques for {{FileformatCap}} Documents with **[{{ProdFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}})**
content.step_1: Kickstart your watermarking process by initializing the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} class. This foundational step sets the stage for enhancing {{FileformatCap}} documents with watermarks. Provide the {{FileformatCap}} file to the constructor, either as a path or a stream object.
content.step_2: Progress to the next level by crafting {{TextWatermarkBold}} objects tailored to your specifications. These versatile entities offer precise placement not only on designated document pages but also within native elements like attachments or headers.
content.step_3: Refine your watermarking process by fine-tuning properties such as dimensions, alignment, font styles, and colors. This level of customization empowers you to create watermarks that perfectly complement your document aesthetics.
content.step_4: Utilize the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} method to apply the newly created watermarks onto your documents. Enjoy the flexibility of adding multiple watermarks as per your requirements. To preserve documents, consider saving them in a secure location.

more_features.title: Mastering Document Watermarks
more_features.description: Elevate your document management with our sophisticated watermarking API, tailored for .NET developers. This tool offers comprehensive solutions for applying, customizing, and managing watermarks across a wide range of document formats, ensuring both aesthetic appeal and enhanced security.

feature_1.title: Flexible Watermark Rotation
feature_1.content: Adapt your watermarks to fit any document orientation with our flexible rotation settings. Whether your document is portrait or landscape, easily adjust the watermark angle to maintain a consistent appearance that complements the document layout.

feature_2.title: Perfect Transparency Control
feature_2.content: Control the transparency of your watermarks with precision, allowing for subtle yet secure markings that do not overwhelm the document's content. This feature is ideal for maintaining the original aesthetic of your documents while adding a layer of security.

feature_3.title: Shadow Effects for Emphasis
feature_3.content: Enhance the visibility of your watermarks or subtly integrate them into your documents with customizable shadow effects. This feature allows for shadows of varying blur, spread, and color, making the watermark more distinctive or discreet as required.

code_1.title: MS Word locked watermark
code_1.content: This example shows how to lock watermark in DOCX all pages

code_1.comment_4: Add watermark to result document pages

about.title: {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} provides Java developers with a robust set of tools to add, remove, search, and manage watermarks in {{FileFormatUp}} files. This API makes it simple to integrate comprehensive watermarking functionalities into any Java application, supporting a wide range of document management tasks. Whether you need to protect intellectual property, ensure document authenticity, or prevent unauthorized sharing, {{ProdShortName}} equips you with the necessary tools. It supports text and image watermarks and offers extensive customization options such as adjusting opacity, rotation, and scaling to fit various use cases. Compatible with all major operating systems that support Java 8 or above.
